body:
Seems like we're not hanging up on buildlets, despite our attempts to do so:

```
bradfitz@farmer ~ $ sudo lsof -p 21941 | wc -l
1036
bradfitz@farmer ~ $ sudo lsof -p 21941 | grep :http | wc -l
1020
bradfitz@farmer ~ $ sudo lsof -p 21941 | grep :http | head -20
coordinat 21941 root    0u  IPv4           14190756      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:39594->buildlet-linux-amd64-noopt-f46e51a2-rn1481b9.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root    3u  IPv4           12478678      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:47781->metadata:http (CLOSE_WAIT)
coordinat 21941 root    5u  IPv4           13191064      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:57465->10.240.171.124:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root    7u  IPv4           12512332      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:40707->10.240.12.235:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root    8u  IPv4           12512361      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:60858->10.240.151.187:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root    9u  IPv4           12528746      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:46661->10.240.13.250:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   10u  IPv4           12511336      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:40626->10.240.13.29:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   11u  IPv4           12490768      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:36800->10.240.50.144:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   12u  IPv4           12511339      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:43263->10.240.157.244:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   13u  IPv6           12478684      0t0      TCP *:http (LISTEN)
coordinat 21941 root   14u  IPv4           13239897      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:39391->10.240.248.154:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   15u  IPv4           12514508      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:33668->10.240.131.223:http (ESTABLISHED)

coordinat 21941 root   18u  IPv4           12491823      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:44942->10.240.123.20:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   19u  IPv4           12513926      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:39284->10.240.105.160:http (ESTABLISHED)
coordinat 21941 root   20u  IPv4           12480353      0t0      TCP farmer.c.symbolic-datum-552.internal:57665->10.240.53.176:http (ESTABLISHED)
```
